description: This file is a Vitest configuration script for setting up testing environment with specific configurations, such as environment type, exclusion patterns, and root directory.

methods.name: mergeConfig
methods.description: Merges multiple configuration objects into one, combining settings for testing.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Helps in defining a configuration object, providing type safety and IDE support.

methods.name: configDefaults
methods.description: Default configuration settings provided by vitest for test environment, including default exclude patterns.
